description: These cozy vegan ratatouille bowls are made with a base of creamy polenta, topped with a savory mixture of garlicky summer veggies and savory marinated baked tofu.
name: Creamy Polenta Ratatouille Bowls with Savory Tofu
recipeIngredient: 1 lb. extra firm tofu, (drained and pressed)
1 Tbsp. fresh thyme leaves, (or 1 tsp. dried)
1 1/2 cups unflavored soy or almond milk

recipeInstructions.text: While the ratatouille simmers, stir together soy sauce, red wine vinegar, vegan Worcestershire sauce, thyme, sage and black pepper in a small bowl. Add tofu cubes and toss to coat. Allow to marinate for 15 to 30 minutes.

Preheat oven to 400Â° and line a baking sheet with parchment. Arrange tofu cube on parchment and place into the oven. Bake for about 40 minutes, carefully flipping halfway through, until tofu has darkened a bit and taken on a chewy texture.
